name: Foundry Helix
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Foundry Helix deals 4 damage to any target. If the sacrificed permanent was an artifact, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: Steel never forgets the strike of the forge.

name: Dihada's Ploy
oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card. You gain life equal to the number of cards you've discarded this turn.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavor_text: The past piece was finally in place.

name: Smell Fear
oracle_text:
Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control.
flavor_text:
"It's fun when they run a little."
—Wasitora, Nekoru queen

name: Jewel-Eyed Cobra
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Jewel-Eyed Cobra dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"Sure, they're worth a lot, but I'd rather survive to spend my earnings."
—Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

name: Flourishing Strike
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Flourishing Strike deals 5 damage to target creature with flying.
• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

name: Duskshell Crawler
oracle_text:
When Duskshell Crawler enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: They often perch on street lamps, causing the poles to buckle under their weight.

name: Deepwood Denizen
oracle_text:
Vigilance
{5}{G}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each +1/+1 counter on creatures you control.
flavor_text: "You didn't come all this way to just bother me, did you? Say your piece and be gone."

name: Crack Open
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: What no spell or lock pick could open, the forest coaxed apart.

name: Bannerhide Krushok
oracle_text:
Trample
Reinforce 2—{1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.)
Scavenge {5}{G}{G} ({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

name: Viashino Lashclaw
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Victory is the greatest motivator of all. So sayeth the bey."

name: Unholy Heat
oracle_text:
Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: "The devils use fire. Why shouldn't we?"

name: Revolutionist
oracle_text:
When Revolutionist enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Mount Velus Manticore
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. When you do, Mount Velus Manticore deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of card types the discarded card has.
flavor_text: Born from a stray spark that flew from Purphoros's forge.

name: Mine Collapse
oracle_text:
If it's your turn, you may sacrifice a Mountain rater than pay this spell's mana cost.
Mine Collapse deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Good ol' rock," muttered Rhirhok as the shaking began. "Nice ol' rock . . ."

name: Lightning Spear
flavor_text: When wielded, it begs to be released.
